授業目的: Introducing the basic language functions and grammar needed at the elementary level, this course will train students to understand short conversations spoken in natural English and to use everyday expressions to interact and share information on themselves, their families, hobbies, school life, professions, travel and daily routines. Training will also be given in the communication strategies used by native speakers in listening and speech acts.
到達目標: To encourage maximum student participation, pair and group work will feature prominently in classroom activities, which will include role plays, surveys, songs and games. While building listening and oral skills, the course will also provide practice in elementary English writing patterns so that students are able to construct simple but effective messages.
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法: Lecture, Class participation, listening exercises, video lessons, interviews with the teacher. If in-person classes are not possible classes using Zoom or Google classroom will be used. Instructions will be given on LUNA Announcement board. Students are required to check LUNA prior to class for updates from the instructor.

第1回: There is no textbook. Materials for the class will be provided.
第2回: Week 2- Individualism vs group identity– People place value on group identity or individual freedoms. We will look at how different countries look at these topics.
第3回: Week 3 - Politeness / manners and / Customs– We will spend two classes looking at being able to explain Japanese culture to people who are not Japanese.
第4回: Week 4- Politeness / manners and / Customs – Presentations
第5回: Week 5 – Communication styles – We will look at different ways in which people express themselves. How culture, sex, age and settings impact different language styles.
第7回: Week 7 – Gender and Culture – Every culture has different expectations about gender (Work/ house work/ dating / childcare) we will explore these topics.
第9回: Week 9 – Looking at holidays around the world. Students will research and create a PP presentation on a cultural holiday from another culture and present it to the class.
第11回: Week 11 – Looking at future dreams and goals for the next year, 3 years and 10 years.
第13回: Interview tests – Each student will have a 10-minute English interview covering topics covered in class.
第14回: Interview tests – Each student will have a 10-minute English interview covering topics covered in class.
